name: df-homa
body: |- wceq(choma, cmpt(s0, ccat, cmpt(s1, cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(chom, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ HomA =(s0 ∈ Cat ↦(s1 ∈((Base ` s0)×(Base ` s0))↦({ s1 } ×((Hom ` s0)` s1))))
comment: Definition of the hom-set extractor for arrows, which tags the morphisms of the underlying hom-set with domain and codomain, which can then be extracted using ~ df-doma and ~ df-coda . (Contributed by FL, 6-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
